content.detailedDescription: it was a monday, bright sunshine, approximately 2:00 pm, i was getting ready to go to work in new york as a consultant to the us delegate to greece, when i saw my bedroom window was getting dark. it looked like the windows on a car completely encompassing the whole window. i watched it as it slowly moved away, then becoming completely white. i thought it was a helicopter and quickly ran down the stairs and outside. i looked up and saw nothing. i went back in the house and thought i should go out the front, that maybe the helicopter went to the front of the house. i went out, stood on my porch, looked around and saw nothing. then i looked in the sky and saw this gigantic, bright silver, cigar shaped aircraft. it must have been 2 blocks long. there were no windows or hatches . it just stood there. there was no noise of any kind. it was the shape of a cigar holder, very bright. i thought this was great, so i sat down on my stoop and watched it for about 20 minutes.  then, all of a sudden it moved very slowly for about 50 yards and stopped as if it was looking for something. i looked at the horizon and saw  that bright lights of blue, red and green were forming a circle just at the horizon. when it completely formed into a circle the aircraft moved slowly about 50 again, then in one or two seconds took off and disappeared into the circle. it literally disappeared through the circle. i thought this was a great experience and felt bad that i couldn't make contact with them. i've had other personal experiences i will be glad to send you.
content.summary: In the air outside my front door, stationary, no sound. disappeared  in a circle of colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work around 6am when when i not used the sun coming up and i desided to take pictures and on the picture i saw the object
content.summary: I was taking pictures of sun coming up and object appears in picture

content.detailedDescription:
About 4 years ago, perhaps in the late summer of 2010 at around 5:00 pm, i had just left the office building where i work in orlando, florida near the university of central florida. the entrance to my office building generally faces east (see google map).

i was walking across the parking lot toward my vehicle when i spotted a silver, metallic ball, roughly the size of a quarter held at arm���s length, travelling from north to south, approximately 200 feet off the ground, and at a speed of about 120 mph. it flew at a steady rate and made absolutely no noise. i cannot recall the wind conditions at the time, but i do recall it was clear and sunny that day.

it took less than 10 seconds from the time i spotted it until it had disappeared from view by obstructions such as the office building and trees.

when i first noticed the object, i did not think it was anything i could recognize and i knew immediately it was unusual.

i have been interested in the ufo phenomenon for years but i have never seen one before or since this event. my reaction was strange because i just stood there in the parking lot and watched it go by. i did not have enough time to register what i was seeing and get the attention of other people in the parking lot. after the event, i looked around but oddly enough there was nobody else nearby who may have also seen the object.

i am not sure why i waited so long to report it. for some reason i just put it off and then forgot about it. but i decided its better to report it late than not at all.
content.summary: Silver matalic ball flew from north to south with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my husband were walking up our driveway after dinner with my sister and her husband and tim walked up on a rock and asked "leora what's that?"i looked up and saw a whole bunch of lights on the mountain.I named off all the thing i could think of that they could be.From truks to planes and none of then could be it. my husband said "i am going to get me glasses" and leaves me by myself on the rock and the lights leen forward so i can see a perfact circle bigger that the mountain behind it and it slowly leens to the left and then to the right aand then levels out so it's flat again. he comes back and i am scared out of my mined. he askeds me "why are you crying?'  and all i can say was "its a circle, its a circle" and he standing there with me as it lowerd itself all the wasy down the mountianall the way to the bottom and then it disappeared.
   i was so scared that night i could not sleep i watch little lights like glitter go to every tree, and plant on the mountain and fly up into sky all night and every dog on the mountain howled all night long.(the lights bounced up from the bottom of the mountain to the top and into the sky)
  afterwards i was fallowed by lights and all different kinds a ships for 6 months following. i have not gone back to the mountain in 14 years and i belive they are still there to this day.
 (more happened than that you just have to ask me and i'll tell you more)
content.summary: My husband saw lighs in the sky and asked what thry were i looked and saw a bunch of huge lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8:20 pm i went out onto my patio to have a cigarette. at about 8:22 pm i saw what i thought was a low flying airplane with very bright lights over north las vegas until it reversed directions instantly. i got up and went to a spot in my yard where i could see it better. it was moving all over the northwestern sky, up, down, side to side, blinking a greenish blue and red but mostly the greenish blue. the colors were very bright. i immediately reached into my pocket and grabbed my galaxy s4 so that i could try and shoot a video of what i was seeing. 

it's only the second time i have filmed a video on this phone so it was a bit shaky at first. i was also very nervous as this is something you just don't see often. i have one video that is 27 seconds long and a second that is over 5 minutes long. this all appeared to occur over and near nellis air force base which is about 21 miles from my home but once i posted the video on youtube this morning someone else commented that they observed the object as well and said it was much closer to my home than i originally thought. more like 12 or 13 miles. the location was the centennial hills area of las vegas.

my home is on the extreme west side of las vegas. nellis is to the northeast from my home and that is the direction both videos were shot at but now i believe the object was closer to the centennial hills area. part of the longer video is shaky but other parts clearly show this object moving at fast speeds and in a manner no other air worthy craft could possibly do. on several occasions it descended so low that it came close to landing, right in a populated area. my home sits on a lot that is higher than the surrounding lots so my eye level is about the same or higher than the roof tops on the nearby homes.
content.summary: Witnessed a ufo flying all over north las vegas. up, down and side to side.

content.detailedDescription:
3 friends and i were down by the hudson river drinking beer on or around the 4th of july 1977 when we all saw what appeared to be a helicopter down river going back and forth across the river.(searching for a body) it was app. 100 feet off the water cause it went under both bridges as it hovered and went back and forth. when it was directly overhead we all noticed it wasn't making a sound and had large lights pointing down on us. the lights were shining down from the perimeter of the craft and there were at least 15 or so of them. the craft was oval and about 15 feet high. well we all blew this off as no one would believe us. the craft continued up river until it was out of sight. other people in beacon saw this also i later found out. 
remember we were in total silence there by the river. this craft made no sound at all.
content.summary: Saw a silent craft searching the river

content.detailedDescription:
My two brothers and i were walking four of our friends to their home which was at the end of the street when we saw a huge light over into the field which belonged to the navy seabee base. as we got closer to their house we were trying to figure out what this massive light was with each of us throwing out ideas about night maneuvers by the seabees, but as we listened and watched we heard no helicopters or could we hear men shouting. then someone said it was a fire , but there were no fire engines, men, or anything in that field of grass on the ground which would burn like that, nor was the light flickering or moving as flames would do. as we were discussing what we were seeing it became clear to us that this was a craft of some type and all of us agreed that there was nothing on god's green earth that looked like that. we were whispering at this point and weren't sure why our voices had lowered but there was absolute silence as we stood to watch this eerie light...Pure orange on the bottom and yellow on the top. it was a massive oblong shape and domed on the top.It was probably about fifteen hundred to two thousand feet in width and about five stories high. we were a quarter mile or less away from it and could see quite clearly into the field . we stood to watch for about thirty minutes , but two of the little ones began to get scared for some reason so our friends began to
 walk into their house. my brothers turned to walk back to our home about five hundred feet back up the street. i still stood there watching to see if it would begin to rise or do anything. finally i walked back up to our house but i'd return to the front porch to see if i could see it rise into the air but i never did. what was weird is that none of us discussed what we had seen that night...Ever. i will never forget that night though, and now that i'm sixty i wanted to leave this in case someone else by chance had seen something like this.The seabees never even used that land back in those years nor were there any roads back there. the image has stayed in my mind all these years so clearly, the weather was a beautiful clear summer night with not a cloud in the sky. i wanted to let you know too that we only lived about a mile from the beach.I wanted to go into that field so badly the next morning, but the base had a barbed wire fence up with no trespassing signs up and being pretty good kids we never thought about crossing over onto government property. thank you so much for taking my report , and i feel much better knowing it will be on file.
content.summary: A massive craft on the ground with an unwavering orange yellow glow whose light never flickered or changed shape...Made absolutely no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8:20 pm i went out onto my patio to have a cigarette. at about 8:22 pm i saw what i thought was a low flying airplane with very bright lights over north las vegas until it reversed directions instantly. i got up and went to a spot in my yard where i could see it better. it was moving all over the northwestern sky, up, down, side to side, blinking a greenish blue and red but mostly the greenish blue. the colors were very bright. i immediately reached into my pocket and grabbed my galaxy s4 so that i could try and shoot a video of what i was seeing. 

it's only the second time i have filmed a video on this phone so it was a bit shaky at first. i was also very nervous as this is something you just don't see often. i have one video that is 27 seconds long and a second that is over 5 minutes long. this all appeared to occur over and near nellis air force base which is about 21 miles from my home but once i posted the video on youtube this morning someone else commented that they observed the object as well and said it was much closer to my home than i originally thought. more like 12 or 13 miles. the location was the centennial hills area of las vegas.

my home is on the extreme west side of las vegas. nellis is to the northeast from my home and that is the direction both videos were shot at but now i believe the object was closer to the centennial hills area. part of the longer video is shaky but other parts clearly show this object moving at fast speeds and in a manner no other air worthy craft could possibly do. on several occasions it descended so low that it came close to landing, right in a populated area. my home sits on a lot that is higher than the surrounding lots so my eye level is about the same or higher than the roof tops on the nearby homes.
content.summary: Witnessed a ufo flying all over north las vegas. up, down and side to side.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my front porch watching my dog in the yard. i heard to the sound of jets coming my way. so i looked up to see it come into my sight/over the tree line. what i saw was two jets flying over with what looked like a basket ball size sphere following them closely. i continued watching then the sphere then it broke off from following the jets and in a fast turn started flying south of there direction closer to my position. the sphere did not make a sound it was reflective like a shiny metal or chrome. also had the ability to stop and hover plus move very quickly. as i watched it i felt like it was staying in my few on purpose. it was very exciting to me that i was able to see something that didn't make sense to me. i eventually lost sight of it as it went past the tree line. i'm not one to jump to conclusions that it was aliens but i will say that it was something that i never saw before or even heard of. just thought i'd share my sighting and maybe you've heard of something like this before. sorry i don't have a photo of it. 
thanks.
content.summary: Basket ball size "ufo" following two jets

content.detailedDescription: While traveling from white sulpher springs mt to our home, two ufo's silently traveled beside me and my sister for about five miles. i stopped the car, got out to view them more closely when they flew straight up in the sky and disappeared in seconds.  i was in awe and still am.
content.summary: Silver dome shaped oval

content.detailedDescription: I was home in vance, alabama and noticed a beautiful orange colored cloud to the east me. it was approximately 30 minutes before sundown. the cloud was such a lovely color that i had actually thought of taking my camcorder out on the back deck to film it for a bit, but decided at the last moment not to do so. after only about 5 seconds after i walked out onto the back deck and looking toward the east at the cloud, a very large black triangular shaped craft suddenly materialized over the cloud and became observable first from the front and then along to the back. it made a complete 90 degree turn instantaneously to the south and just after doing so it dematerialized again from the front to the back. the turn it made was without slowing down at all and it was such a fast turn that the front of the craft was pointed east and then in an instant it was pointed south. the craft was not flat underneath, but rather came down a bit to what i would call a ridge along the entire craft from front to back along the center of the underside. i witnessed a large amount of what i would call superstructure on the top leading up from the sides and appeared to me to be something like large multiple floors for lack of a better word. the rear of the craft was basically flat and i saw that after it turned southward. there was absolutely no noise coming from the craft and it did not disturb the cloud whatsoever even though it appeared to be right above the cloud. i could hardly believe what i had just witnessed and wished so strongly that i had taken the camcorder out with me as i first had thought to do. the biggest thought to hit my mind other than surprise was the shear size of this craft. if i had to estimate the size i would say that it was at least 2500' from side to side and possibly 5000' from front to back. i've never shared this sighting with anyone but my wife and family in all these years, however i feel that it might be important to report what i saw. thank you.
content.summary: Gigantic black triangular shaped craft with superstructure above.

content.detailedDescription: It was late friday night early saturday morning around 12:30 1 on april 11th 2014 and i was letting my dog out. i noticed how bright the street was and looked around the side of my house and the moon was so bright and so was the star that was right next to it,i thought it was something to tell my 13 yr old son about,and to have him come outside to see for himself ,so he did and he wasn't as thrilled as i was but,i was able to share something that i thought was pretty neat with him. at the time i didn't see anything unusual so i went in and went to bed.The next night was saturday night early sunday morning and i went out to let my dog out. the moon was just as bright and the star was still there as bright as the night before except this time the star moved and that freaked me out,i wasn't sure if my mind or eyes were messing with me so i took my phone out of my robe pocket and and was trying to figure out how to use the camera. i went in the house and asked my son to help me take a picture of the star because it moved and i couldn't figure out my camera he took my phone and took a picture from his window and all you could see was his screen and the star, so i took my phone because he had it on the camera and i went outside and started snapping pictures. my son and i looked them over and were amazed at what i had caught on camera so i got a little scared and decided i would stop for the night. on sunday night the 13th of april 2014 into the early morning of monday the 14th of april 2014 i took my dog out and again looked for that star but this time the moon was over to the left of my house and it was just a half moon, but the star was right in front of my house and it was doing all sorts of things so i started taking pictures and then i realized i could do videos from my phone and i did one and stop after a few minutes,then i tried again and i did a second one and stop,but then i saw it breaking up into three parts and i took more pictures and i started video and i got this sphere shape object spinning very fast with something in it and with a sound i have to be able to make it with my mouth in order for you to understand how it sounded. as i was recording it was fairly cold out and as the sphere seemed to get closer i noticed a sense of calm and warmth come over and then the sound seemed as though it was right in my ear and possibly right above me or behind me so i turned around to see if it was in,even though i could see it in front of me i thought maybe there was two. thank goodness there was nothing behind or above me,just in front of me and then i got really afraid and i stopped and went in side. i will not release my video or photos. your company can send someone to talk with me and view what i have and then we can go from there you have my phone number,my e-mail,and my address please contact me i am very afraid and really don't know what to do. thank you for viewing  [name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was noticing the moon and how bright it was and how bright the star next to it was also then the star moved.It was

content.detailedDescription: It was thanksgiving morning around 1 am and me and two other friends walked outside to smoke a cigarette. i noticed a shooting star off to my right and we started talking about aliens and the universe. so as we were star gazing, i had the best view of the sky, i noticed a big chunk of the sky was darker than the rest. when i starred directly into it, i noticed it was a silhouette in the shape of a triangle. i could also see stars on the object. it was directly above us, i started getting the chills and i tensed up. all i could get out of my mouth was "cloaking, cloaking!" my other two friends started looking up around this time. it started to move and every star that it went in front of another star that it covered was projected on the front of the craft like it didn't want to be seen. it had a cloaking device, as it hovered over the house, it did some type of glitch and the cloaking device that surrounded the whole ship lit up and it appeared to be a greenish blue light, and then it went completely black and took off, and i watched it fly away towards the west coast. when it was flying off i could make out two big weird light looking circles on each side of the boomerang. when it was black it looked like it was something similar to the phoenix lights craft.
content.summary: Cloaked boomrang ufo over louisiana

content.detailedDescription: We were camping along the alcan highway watson lake area. in the morning my older brother and i got up to  start the morning fire when we saw something in the sky over the lake it was a flat black in color from where we were standing it looked like a bundle of logs on a logtruck each cigar shaped thing seemed connected and kindof staggered around the center one for a  total of 7 we woke my dad and told him we were watching something in the sky we described it to him he said it was northern lights but after living in alaska i never saw northern lights like that and in broad daylight. strange but i don't remmber what happened what happened to it this has bothered me for almost 40 years i have no clew what we saw.
content.summary: Saw 7 cigar shapes looked connected

content.detailedDescription:
hi. my name is andy i am a former us navy ams/airdale and flyer. i was on a flight from my home in st thomas usvi to atlanta, ga in december of 2013. i hadn���t flown in several years, and being excited to go home and see my family and friends, i was randomly taking video of the clouds and ground. yeah i know ...Korny. bear with me. i didnt��� realize until i got home from my vacation 10 days later and was watching all my videos and reviewing pics that i had captured something that i cannot explain. it is very large and seems to be moving from left to right in the top of the screen. it was at a great distance away...I���d say 20 miles out...And had to have been ���miles��� across to be visible at that distance. i have flown with the navy and all over the us and caribbean for many years. this is simply a huge object. i posted it on facebook to some close friends and several thought it was exceptional. the reason i am sending this to you is that i happened to see a show on h2 (ufo hunters)today[episode original airing 02-04-09] and two different  pilots (a british guy and a french) seemed to have seen the same thing i did. the difference is that his object seemed to emanate light while mine seems to be very black. after watching the video several times i also noticed a flat contrail from the top right of my video that appears to lead right to the object in the distance. this could just be an old jet-contrail that spread out over time, but if so then a jet would have had have passed right by this thing at some point. it is moving very slowly from left to right, then speeds up and crosses the contrail by the end of the video. i have the full length video but i am sure i will only be able to email you this short version. i���ll try both tho. please take a look and tell me what you think.
thanks andy
content.summary: I was flying to atlanta from st thomas for a vacation. i didn't realize i had captured this object on my digital camera until i returned home to st  thomas 10 days later.

content.detailedDescription: I was ten when it happen i was sit on top of the cab of my dad's friend truck and him and like 4or 5 of his buddy's were havering a few beers after work and i was just siting there broad and laid back on the cab and that's when i saw it a large boomerang object that i could make out the out line but could see right throw it and when i looked down to tell my dad something came over me to not say a word i was completely speech less could not say anything even if i tried never forgot still fresh on my mind and have had a number of other things happen to me have trouble explaining and would really love to share my story's with mufon but would like to remain anonymous just would like some closer on some of these thing.
content.summary: When i was ten i saw a boomerang that i could see throw it like wonder women jet i could see throw it but i could see the out line

content.detailedDescription: I live in new york when my nephew called me from puerto rico to tell me he saw something in the skies. during that time my nephew recorded the event and then send me a video and a picture that he capture from that site where he was talking to me on the phone. he ask me to take a look at the video and picture to see what i thought about what he had capture. to me it looks like their was something in the skies that night. so pleas take a look at the video and then look at the picture at a close up look..And please let us know what was that in the skies on november 7th of 2013..
content.summary: Lights going back and forth took pictures. please take picture and make close up and see what is that.I

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from my car to my front door but before i went inside i stop took a couple of pictures of the sun it was like a cloud around it and a rainbow and after looking at the pictures there it was a light that looked that it didnt belong there.
content.summary: Strange light ir wasnt there then it was and then it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
I always remember as a very small boy aged 4 or 5 only feeling safe at night if i was under my covers in bed wrapped up really tightly and i would imagine myself being inside a spaceship which would feel very safe and secure. i would also often dream of floating above my neighbourhood and looking down on the houses below. i had these experiences up till i was about 8.
an incident happened when i was 8 in a bedroom i shared with my 2 older sisters. one of my sisters woke and saw a tall woman with really blond hair standing at the foot of my bed. my sister was really afraid and went to scream but the woman just looked at her and she said she couldn't move or make a noise and either passed out or fell asleep. the same night my oldest sister who would have been about 17 woke and saw the same woman who said to me while i slept "come on roy its time to go now." at this point both my sisters were awake and started to scream. apparently the blonde woman swung around and looked really shocked that the girls had seen her and she just disappeared. my sisters have religiously stood by this event for 45 years. i have no memory of the event. in the same house my father woke to see different coloured lights in my parents room and was that scared he grabbed my mum and wouldn't let her turn round. he would never talk in depth about that experience but was a great believer that life existed in another dimension.
the most recent event i experienced was in july 2011 when i woke and saw this small being at the bottom of my bed. it looked like a gray, about 4 ft tall black almond eyes a small nose and a slit for a mouth. it had spindly arms and i could only see it to just past its shoulders because of where it was standing closer to my wife's side. i was not surprised to see it nor did i panic. i felt this was a normal event and was very calm. i sat up and focused on the gray which seemed to have 2 small an tenors on its head. he looked at me didn't move his mouth but i felt him say to me. "its ok just lie down and go back to sleep, your not supposed to see this. everthing is alright." i laid down and closed my eyes and went back to sleep.
i have no idea why i was so calm and did as i was asked.
my wife doesn't like me to talk about it and maybe thinks i was dreaming. i am absolutely sure i wasn't.
content.summary: Small grey entity at bottom of my bed on my wifes side.

content.detailedDescription: I was 10 years old. we were playing hide & seek at our summer house on the east side of owasco lake. i looked up the hill and saw what appeared to be a triangle moving slowly in a southerly direction on the east side of the lake. i only knew it was huge because the body of the object blocked out the trees and field it was above. i only could tell it was triangular because 2 sides had lights. the lights were on the left and right side towards the point or top of the triangle with the back or 3rd side had no apparent lights. there was no sound, not even the normal night noises it became completely silent. but i felt rather than heard a low very low sound but i felt it inside of myself. the object did not change direction it did not slow down or speed up, just moved toward the south at a controlled somewhat slow speed. it finally moved out of my line of sight. the feelings i had told me that it was something that was not within the realm of things i could describe that might be in the air and i somehow knew it was a once in a lifetime event. of course i knew no one would believe me so i only told my dad. he left me a feeling of i was seeing things but i knew i wasn't
content.summary: Could see triangle shape because lights & size because it blacked out between lights

content.detailedDescription: My father took these pictures from his car on april 15 2014 here in sarasota fl. the sun had an unusual rings around it he snapped several shots on his cell phone he saw a blue green object in the photos. then a purple object. the blue green object had moved from bottom toward the top. thought that you might like to see these objects and the sun rings.
content.summary: Objects in the sun rings

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside my cousin's garage when he told me to check out a shooting star in the distance.  i turned to the left (west) and saw a bright blue "large sized star" object shoot from the tree line up towards the brightest star in the sky in less than one second.

the blue light now made a weird irregular box pattern where it went to the right about an inch, down, to the left, up, right, up, down, left, then back to the previous spot at the star.  during this time the light remained the dark blue color.  during this time, we were trying to make sense out of what it is we were looking at.

next, the object started to hover but expanded to the size of a dime and was bright blue.  inside the blue led looking light we saw black features and lines on the object.  the color suddenly changed to a green, then to a deep red, then an orangish/yellow, then to an intense bright white.  each color was emitted for roughly 2-3 seconds without flashing.

after the series of color changes, the object immediately shrank back down to the star size and returned to a blue dot which moved in the sky.  at this time i realized i was seeing something unique and took out my phone to record a video.  we watched this phenomenon for approximately 45-60 seconds before i recorded the remaining portion of the sighting.

the video is 28 seconds and shows the blue star descend towards the tree line, changing color to green, then to white.  it now goes behind the trees to the left, pops back out to the right, increases in size, grows larger and turns white, then goes left into the trees, starts flashing, and then it left.

we heard a noise on 3 separate occasions while watching the craft.  at first, i thought the noise was generated from a screen door opening and making a low creaking noise.  however, the slight hum occured just before the object ascended or descended.  during the actual path, the object was quiet.  it was a quick burst of a humming noise that could have easily been talked over.

the event did not leave an uncomfortable feeling with either of us the feelign was pretty soothing as we were watching this.  both of us were in complete disbelief of what we noticed that night.  when we saw the object increase in size and begin the color sequence, we both realized that we saw a ufo.  here are a couple other pertinent details:
     1. dallas ft. worth airport 20 miles south of the sighting.
     2. airplanes were making their initial descent in the background
        before and after the event (not during).
     3. it would take an airplane approximately 30 seconds to travel the 
        path that this object could cover in less than one second
     4. there are only two rows of streets between the sighting and  
        lewisville lake
     5. lewisville lake is approximately 2,000 feet due west from the house
     6. between the lake and houses are hiking trails 
     7. it was clear that the object was flying above the lake
     8. route 35e crosses this lake on a bridge about 5 miles west of the 
        spot we were at.  there are no lights from the horizon in that  
        direction.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue star-size, color change, size change, color patterns

content.detailedDescription:
About 10pm on wednesday april 16th, i went out to have a smoke before going to bed. walked into my back yard and looked up at the stars. being in salt lake the stars were a little faded because of light pollution. i was thinking what a beautiful night it would be away from the city. i looked to the east towards the wasatch mountains, through a black walnut tree(no leaves yet) i saw a bright light. slightly red, my first thought was that i was looking at mars...Then i thought that is too far north for mars so i looked slightly south through a box elder tree and saw mars. i looked back at the light while reaching for my phone to find out what star it was, when it began to move, south and east. at about a 40 degree angle to the horizon. slowly at first then faster as it faded to a pinpoint and disappeared. i wasn't sure what i had just seen so i sat there for a few seconds pondering what it could have been when another light appeared and began to move in the same way. this time traveling at about the same speed but in the north easterly direction and about 30 degrees to the horizon doing exactly the same distance across the sky(approximately 5")maybe the width of a softball held at arms length. the lights faded to a pinpoint then disappeared both times giving me the impression that it was ascending very fast. at first i thought that the light went behind a cloud, but where they both disappeared i could still see stars. the whole sighting lasted about 20 seconds. not enough time to get video or pictures. i watched for about another 5 minutes phone ready for video(enough time to finish my smoke) and didn't see anything more. i pondered what this could have been. i know it was not a meteor, plane, rocket or helicopter. it traveled in a straight line that gave me the impression it was going up at an angle.

my background.
i have been around aviation my entire life. 3 years at the sl international airport as a ground maintenance mechanic. 
i have flown most of my working life, over a million miles in airplanes,
i worked for atk thiokol for over 20 years, 5 of those working on launch pads at cape canaveral and vanderburgh afb.
i am an avid space lover, been looking at night sky's my whole life. 
i have an aas degree in manufacturing. 
i love to watch meteor showers and plan camping trips around the times when they are active. 
i have never seen anything i could not explain until last night.

if you could come up with an explanation i would appreciate it. i am mainly reporting this in the event someone else saw the same thing and reported it.
content.summary: Two lights 7 seconds apart heading in two different directions

content.detailedDescription: Reviewing
content.summary: Camp david disk november 1978

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside our apartment at the village green apartments in montgomery, alabama to have a cigarette and looked up. there were almost no city light, thus, making it very clear to see. called out to my girlfriend (both sober) and i was awe struck. i felt an immediate connection and it came closer. my grandfather and i were airplane buffs - he built his first plane when 17 - it flew. the motions appeared as if you you were watching a bus go east at 35 mph while a juggler walked west while juggling, but w/ perfect symmetry. the object seemed as if it dropped from 20,000' to under 10,000' then went back up and shot off just like in a movie to the ne sky into a thick constellation- if i recall correctly. my girlfriend's father was not even phased. he was was a scientist w/ the u.S. air force. he was like "yeah". he almost seemed that he was aware and was considering retiring. two weeks later i was walking into my house and my girlfriend and mother were sitting about 18 feet away from me. as i walked through the door a flash of white light consumed me in 12' to 15' radius. they both saw it. maybe a month or two later while visiting my mother i felt a strange sensation in my head as if my dominant eye was going from right to left. i held my hand over my eye and sure enough, i was now left eye dominant. my left hand became so much more useful but only lasted a couple of weeks. i've never felt comfortable about coming out and i'm not sure i ever will. i would just like answers. 
   
   i met w/ a chineese medicine guru who hipnotized me in 2000 while living in los angeles. afterwards i was crying and he said i'd been abducted as a child. i thought it was b.S., however, his story was just like a reoccurring dream i had be
tween the age 3 and 5 where i was in my own house w/ greys doing experiments, but i was never frightened until i woke up, because i couldn't move for minutes and my parents would never wake up. i do remember one time where they would not wake up, but i don't recall anything before that. i'd take a lie detector test in a heart beat. i never felt threatened by these dreams. in fact when i experienced the left eye dominance shift. i felt as if i saw the the universe and felt as if i were levitating, but perhaps not. i saw the davinci man and then almost a tunnel of truths and enlightenment. everything else in the world seems insignificant now. and feel as if i'm waiting to find out something more. please keep my info private. i'm not sure if my ex or her father would come forward. so i don't feel comfortable disclosing that information at this juncture. i would like to talk to a few others that have experienced this who are not full of b.S. conspiracy theorists that have been through the same thing. 

     thank you for listening,
      cope till
content.summary: 5 red dots movong in diamond / cross formation almost bending time in their movements. checked w/ maxwell airforce base -no flights scheduled that night. 1 other witness w/ me. as well as af officer checking flight plan.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were sitting in my car by the ocean watching the lunar eclipse and i was taking photos from inside my car of the moon. i noticed to bright objects above the moon but to the east, slowly moving toward the moon. there was a red orb like object above the larger yellowish one, at approximately 45 degrees, however they appeared to be moving toward the moon in unison. i said out loud, "what are those?" and my girlfriend said, "i don't know....Weird." i took a few photos with my cell camera as the objects "drifted" closer to the moon, the largest one now parallel with the moon.  they began to descend below the moon and then i switched the camera to video and got about ten seconds or so on video before they seemed to completely vanish. i replayed to video to see if i had indeed captured whatever they were and saw that i had. we both stayed for approx. another half an hour watching the eclipse and scanning the skies for any sign of moving objects but saw none. we both kept asking each other what we thought they were and came up with everything from some kind of nasa observation drones, to satellites to extraterrestrial craft. 
we are both still baffled. i ran the photos through the effects program on my camera, and uploaded them to my facebook page, including the video. what i found astounding on the video is the larger "object" appears to be pulsating or spinning as there is a definite bright dot that looks to be spinning around the center of the object and disappearing behind the "craft" in a clockwise motion.  
photo 131 is just prior to the objects appearing and 135 is just after they disappeared.
photos 132 and 133 are the objects, and 134 is the video.
i transferred these directly from my cell camera to my computer. the video appears to be rotated 45 degrees to the left from the actual view. the actual orientation of the objects to the moon are shown in the photos.
content.summary: Saw red orb and larger yellowish object slowly glide toward eclipsing moon, go under it and instantly disappear

content.detailedDescription:
At around 7 or 8pm (it was completely dark) i came out of my car and noticed multiple ufo's.
i was on preciado ave. with perfect view of heritage park. from the distance in the direction north i noticed several objects go into the sky....At first i assumed they were fire works since their take of resembled a fire work firing off into the sky, but to my surprise they were completely different. once ascending at great speeds, these circular objects were able to slow down and hover, emitting no noise. after awhile they changed their course and then formed a triangle amongst themselves. after a couple minutes they faded into the sky. i, along with my boyfriend caught them on camera. 

honestly, i think it's cool. i wish i could see more ufo's.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple glowing red orbs that not only changed speed, but also changed direction, eventually forming a triangle

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dogs around gondolier blvd, circle.Did not notice until passing carl and janeeen litzingers house i caught sight out of the corner of my eye. i hurried to the left side of their house it was above the tree line, no just below.  it continued to move in a eastward direction it was slow in movement. it had an unusual half moon shadow shape on its right side connected to the huge orange circle. it was hot bright orange on fire.It lasted for a short time, i had no time to call anyone or run to neighours homes and shout for them to come and see what i had seen. i didnt want to miss anything anything so i watched, i did not panic i just watched, in an instance it flashed and changed shape in to a bright white pulsating white shape. it had all the colors of the rainbow running around the edges, the object was very much smaller that the huge orange light i had had first seen.It lasted for a very short time, then dissapeard. that was it
content.summary: Hot glowing orange light huge with strange half moon shadow on right side in a flash changed into a bright white pulsating with all the colors of the rainbow glowing and running around the pulsating white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting a friend in celina for a week. my last night in town  i heard about the eclipse earlier in the day, so went out in front of the house and aimed my camera at the moon.  i noticed two bright shapes by the moon. at first i thought they were both stars so started taking pics and saw one begin to move.
i just started snapping shots and continued. seemed like a couple minutes.
i watched the shape move in triangular motions and then directly above or below or in front or behind the moon.  it then began to descend further south and then faded into the sky.  pic details show this went on for 35 minutes occurring from 1:11 am to 1:44. i took pics of the eclipse at 2:23 or so and there was only one other object in the sky and the moon was in the eclipse.
content.summary: Taking a pic of the moon as the cresent of the eclipse started
